betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Tired of spamming Centrifuges already? 

Alas, with your newfound ZPM technology you can finally fabricate a Centrifuge with some real power; §5§lThe Spinmatron-2737§r!

The Spinmatron§r comes with a litany of advantages compared to the regular centrifuge multiblock, including a §2§l3x§r Speed boost, a §2§l30%§r reduction in EU usage, and a malleable number of parallels.

Unlike the generic turbine that comes stock in a normal Centrifuge, the Spinmatron§r graciously allows you to choose the quality of the turbines that go into the machine. You can add between §9§l2-8§r turbines depending on the machine tier, each turbine will increase the parallel amount by [§94 * Turbine Material Tier§r]. §3(You'll want to avoid using smaller, non-huge turbines!)§r

This efficiency comes at a cost however, and will require [§9Recipe Tier * 10§r] L/s of §5Kerosene§r in order to run. This can optionally be switched out with §5Biocatalyzed Propulsion Fluid§r for a §2§l1.25x§r parallel multiplier once you've reached §4UEV§r.

Additionally there are three modes that come unique to the Spinmatron:

- §dLight§r -> Gives increased speed in exchange for only being able to process [Voltage Tier - 3] recipes

- §6Normal§r -> No changes

- §aHeavy§r -> Grants the ability to craft Heavy Mode dependent recipes in exchange for reducing your parallels by §c§l32x§r and consuming §5Biocatalyzed Propulsion Fluid§r.

[note]Checkout the tooltip for more information![/note]

[warn]Use the GUI for adding turbines; don't add them to the rotor assemblies.[/warn]
